# Zone Configurations

## Overview

Different project architectures require different zone configurations. Choose the appropriate configuration based on the components involved.

## Configuration 1: Full Azure (Cloud-Native)

**Use when**: All services are in Azure, no on-premise systems.


```yaml
      - name: "External Services"
        color: "#D5E8D4"
        border: "#82B366"
```

```yaml

    color: "#FFF2CC"
    border: "#D6B656"

    color: "#DAE8FC"
    border: "#6C8EBF"
    position: center
    sub_zones:
      - name: "External Services"
        color: "#D5E8D4"
        border: "#82B366"
```

**Use when**: Multiple source systems, multiple targets, complex flows.

## Zone Dimensions (Recommended)

| Configuration | Zone | Min Width | Min Height |
|---------------|------|-----------|------------|
| Full Azure | Azure Cloud | 500px | 400px |
| Hybrid | On-Premise | 200px | 300px |
| Hybrid | Azure Cloud | 400px | 400px |
| Multi-Zone | On-Premise | 180px | 250px |
| Multi-Zone | Azure Cloud | 450px | 550px |
| Multi-Zone | External | 180px | 300px |

## Zone Selection Decision Tree

```
START
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ Any on-premise systems?
  â”‚    â”‚
  â”‚    â”œâ”€ YES â†’ Configuration 2 (Hybrid) or 3 (Multi-Zone)
  â”‚    â”‚         â”‚
  â”‚    â”‚         â”œâ”€ More than 2 external systems? â†’ Configuration 3
  â”‚    â”‚         â”‚
  â”‚    â”‚         â””â”€ Otherwise â†’ Configuration 2
  â”‚    â”‚
  â”‚    â””â”€ NO â†’ Configuration 1 (Full Azure)
  â”‚
  â””â”€ Need Monitoring zone?
       â”‚
       â””â”€ Add Monitoring sub-zone if App Insights/Log Analytics present
```
